## Step 3: Install Windows 7 Gamer Edition 2021 ISO on your PC
 
Now that you have a DVD or a USB drive with Windows 7 Gamer Edition 2021 ISO, you are ready to install it on your PC. Make sure you backup your important data before proceeding, as this will erase everything on your hard drive.
 
To install Windows 7 Gamer Edition 2021 ISO, you need to boot your PC from the DVD or the USB drive. To do this, you may need to change the boot order in your BIOS settings. Restart your PC and press the key that opens the BIOS menu (usually F2, F10, F12, or Del). Look for the boot options and set the DVD or USB drive as the first boot device. Save the changes and exit.
 
Your PC will then boot from the DVD or USB drive and start the installation process. Follow the instructions on the screen and choose your language, keyboard layout, time zone, etc. When prompted, choose "Custom (advanced)" as the installation type and select the partition where you want to install Windows 7 Gamer Edition 2021 ISO. Format the partition if necessary and click "Next". Wait for the installation process to complete.
 
After the installation is done, your PC will restart and load Windows 7 Gamer Edition 2021 ISO. You can now enjoy your gaming experience with this amazing operating system.
